title: Easier way for out of game communications
body: Maybe like a public chat or something. Even maybe a way to make the current chat room system... Better. I seriously have seen no one use it except for the pool party.

replies.body:
Use Curse no lag like skype

But Curse client is annoying it starts itself everytime you run windows, persistent like a wannabe streamer.

Apart from that  Curse is good.
M8 they already have a public chat if u looked ...

"Looked" ~ Or they could create a truly public chat room at the click of a button or at least give a list of them without having to search them up. Generally I imagine, the average user doesn't want to look on external websites for a list of all the active chat rooms. EDIT: I decided to look for a public chat room. It's no easy task to find one on OCE, the only one I can find is the pool party which is irrelevant now.
